summary: The diff implements all four requirements from the BuildRequest. The school name is displayed as the main heading in App.tsx, the complete address (Shyamdeurwa, Mahmada, Uttar Pradesh 273301) is shown in the Contact Information section, the phone number 09118508216 is displayed, and a professional educational theme using burgundy/gold colors (avoiding blue/purple) is implemented via custom CSS variables and Tailwind configuration. No missing requirements or hallucinated features detected.

hallucinated_features.description: Welcome section with descriptive text about the institution
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not ask for any welcome text, mission statements, or descriptive content about the school

hallucinated_features.description: Feature cards grid showcasing Quality Education, Experienced Faculty, and Holistic Development with icons
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request any feature cards, icons, or descriptions of school programs/values

hallucinated_features.description: Call-to-action section with 'Get in Touch' heading and button
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request any call-to-action elements or interactive buttons

hallucinated_features.description: Email icon and label in contact section
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only requests phone number and address; no email contact is specified

hallucinated_features.description: Footer with copyright text and creator attribution
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request a footer or any copyright/attribution information
